data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Thrissur access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Thrissur, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Thrissur, Kerala, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Thrissur, Kerala, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Thrissur to agree with you and with one another.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Vallan people.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Thrissur.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 34,333 believers in Thrissur, Kerala, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Thrissur, Kerala, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
